jollyRoger: A skull with a smiley face, wearing Doflamingo's signature sunglasses

keyMoments.title: Buffalo Debuts as Crew Member
keyMoments.description: Buffalo makes his first appearance as an officer of the Donquixote Pirates, sent on a mission to Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Expands the known roster of Doflamingo's crew and demonstrates their reach.

keyMoments.title: Doflamingo Orders Caesar's Recovery
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo changes the mission parameters for Baby 5 and Buffalo, ordering them to retrieve Caesar and return to Dressrosa immediately.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Doflamingo's command over his crew and his strategic response to the crisis.

statusHistory.reason: Crew is operational under Doflamingo's command

description: A powerful pirate crew led by Donquixote Doflamingo, one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. The crew operates an extensive underworld network dealing in weapons, Devil Fruits, and other illegal goods.
